articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: 'Could not stop myself...': PM Narendra Modi on his arrival in Bengaluru post Chandrayaan-3 success | Mint - Mint
articles.description: PM Modi was on a 4-day tour to South Africa and Greece when India achieved the historical landmark on becoming the first country to land on moon's South Pole on 23 August at 6:04 pm (IST).
articles.content:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi on 26 August was accorded a warm reception as he arrived at the ISRO headquarters in Bengaluru.
